Petrus Lombardus Sentences

Turtle | RDF/XML | N-Triples | JSON-LD | GitHub
drcs:
a
owl:Ontology
dct:contributor
Roberta Padlina, project coordinator and software developer, University of Basel, Switzerland
,
Gabriel Müller, Faculty of Theology, University of Basel, Switzerland (en)
and
Prof. Dr. Ueli Zahnd, Institut D'histoire De La Réformation, University of Geneva, Switzerland (en)
dct:creator
Hans Cools, MD, knowledge engineer, ontologist, software developer, NIE, University of Basel, Switzerland
dct:description
Formal description of specific concepts in the scientific study of Commentaries on Peter Lombard's Sentences, as in the Digital Repertory of Commentaries on Peter Lombard’s Sentences (DRCS).
dct:license
http://creativecommons.org/ licenses/ by/ 3.0/
dct:publisher
Universities of Basel, Bern, and Zürich, Switzerland
rdfs:seeAlso
https://de.wikipedia.org/ wiki/ Friedrich Stegmüller
dct:title
An ontology for the Digital Repertory of Commentaries on Peter Lombard’s Sentences
owl:versionInfo
2020-06-11

Instances

drcs:stegmuellerSystem
a
concept:CodingSystem
rdfs:comment
The Stegmüller-system for coding a commentary on Petrus Lombardus' Sentences.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
drcs:
rdfs:label
Stegmüller-system (en)

Properties

drcs:hasStegmuellerCode
a
owl:FunctionalProperty
rdfs:comment
Relating a commentary on Petrus Lombardus' Sentences to its Stegmüller's code.
rdfs:domain
drcs:Commentary
rdfs:isDefinedBy
drcs:
rdfs:label
has Stegmüller's code (en)
skos:note
E.g. drcs-pd:commentary-1 drcs:hasStegmuellerCode [concept:codeHasSystem drcs:stegmuellerSystem; concept:codeHasValue "x"^^drcs:stegmuellerDatatype]
rdfs:range
drcs:StegmuellerCode
rdfs:subPropertyOf
concept:hasCode
drcs:hasStegmuellerCodeValue
a
owl:DatatypeProperty
rdfs:comment
Relating a commentary on Petrus Lombardus' Sentences to its Stegmüller's code value.
rdfs:domain
drcs:Commentary
rdfs:isDefinedBy
drcs:
rdfs:label
has Stegmüller's code value (en)
skos:note
E.g. drcs-pd:commentary-1 drcs:hasStegmuellerCodeValue "x"^^drcs:stegmuellerDatatype]
rdfs:range
drcs:stegmuellerDatatype
a
rdfs:Datatype
rdfs:comment
Datatype to type a Stegmüller's code.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
drcs:
rdfs:label
Stegmüller-datatype (en)
rdfs:subPropertyOf
concept:hasCodeValue
drcs:hasStegmuellerCommentaryDescriptionLiteral
a
owl:DatatypeProperty
rdfs:comment
Relating a commentary on Petrus Lombardus' Sentences to a Stegmüller's description literal thereof.
rdfs:domain
drcs:Commentary
rdfs:isDefinedBy
drcs:
rdfs:label
has Stegmüller's commentary description literal (en)
rdfs:range
rdfs:Literal
rdfs:subPropertyOf
text:hasDescriptionLiteral
drcs:hasStegmuellerPersonDescriptionLiteral
a
owl:DatatypeProperty
rdfs:comment
Relating a person to a Stegmüller's description literal thereof.
rdfs:domain
drcs:Person
rdfs:isDefinedBy
drcs:
rdfs:label
has Stegmüller's person description literal (en)
rdfs:range
rdfs:Literal
rdfs:subPropertyOf
